scripts.postinstall: copyfiles -f node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.mjs src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.mjs.map src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/tabulator-tables/dist/css/tabulator.min.css src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/tabulator-tables/dist/js/tabulator_esm.min.mjs src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/tabulator-tables/dist/js/tabulator_esm.min.mjs.map src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/rbush/rbush.min.js src/ && node scripts/patch-jasmine-webdriver.js
